question:
Identify the correct set of states that represent the following distinct geographical points in India respectively:
  1. Pygmalion Point
  2. Magnetic Hill
  3. Point Calimere
  4. False Divi Point
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
option1: Andaman & Nicobar Islands, Jammu & Kashmir, Tamil Nadu, Andhra Pradesh
option2: Tamil Nadu, Jammu & Kashmir, Karnataka, Tamil Nadu
option3: Lakshadweep, Jammu & Kashmir, Tamil Nadu, Andaman Nicobar Islands
answer: Andaman & Nicobar Islands, Jammu & Kashmir, Tamil Nadu, Andhra Pradesh
